title: Buffer
description: A buffer is a binary blob. It is either the binary chunk of the subtree file, or an external buffer referenced by a URI.

uri.description: The URI (or IRI) of the external schema file. Relative paths are relative to the file containing the buffer JSON. If `uri` is omitted, the buffer is assumed to refer to the binary chunk of the subtree file.

byteLength.description: The length of the buffer in bytes.
